title: Forbidden
description: Tracy Bachman has come to grips with the crystals, their powers, and what she can do with them. But she soon finds that accepting them does not bring any peace.Her acceptances of the crystals brings real danger. There are others who would use her for her powers, lurking closer than she may think. And in an abrupt turn of events, she is forced to abandon Traven Island to escape the very real dangers that threaten her very life. Together with her friends, she embarks on an exhilarating journey that takes her far from her idyllic paradise. But the path she walks is lined with daggers, and a single mis-step can cost Tracy her life.Forbidden is the second book of The Seeker Saga, full of breathless action, a chortling pace, and a thriving romance. Look for the next book of the series to be out in July 2012.
author: Sarah Swan
